title: 納斯達克要求瑞幸咖啡退市

replies.msg:
(Reuters) - Nasdaq Inc (NDAQ.O) has delivered a notice to China's Luckin Coffee Inc (LK.O) informing it that it has to delist from the U.S. stock exchange, people familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.

Luckin Coffee, which had a U.S. IPO in early 2019, announced last month that an internal investigation had shown its chief operating officer and other employees fabricated sales deals.

The sources requested anonymity ahead of an official announcement. Luckin Coffee and Nasdaq did not immediately respond to requests for comment.
第一滴血

replies.msg:
香港對於中共唯一用途，就係比企業上市,發債, 得到港幣, ie 美元

美國嘅殺手鐧係禁止中國公司喺香港發行美金計算嘅債券或者股票

但係當中有好多好多華爾街利益，美國政府就算想咁做, 有冇咁嘅政治能量去做係另一回事

我記得連燒山都留意到咖啡市場近年銷售大增
仲記唔記得巴西大火澳洲大火
有可能燒完再搵人話種咖啡
至少巴西可以
